name: Ravnica: City of Guilds (Comprehensive)
description: HUGE package covering Convoke (Selesnya), Dredge (Golgari), Transmute (Dimir), Radiance (Boros), hybrid costs, guild commons/uncommons, signets, guildmages, and shockland-style lands.
